title: Large Database SEO Architect for 1M+ page website
snippet:
We are a small, specialized, industrial B2B wholesale distributor of electronic components. We handle a database of over 1 million part numbers from the various manufacturers we support through our e-commerce website. We are having issues achieving good SEO performance even after applying best practices and believe this is a more technical problem than a content/keyword problem as our products rely on part numbers (SKUs) for searching.

We seek an experienced SEO expert experienced handling large MySQL/PHP websites with a B2B SEO track record. We would like to have a consultation with the following goals:

-Discuss our known technical issues
-Audit current page code
-Audit indexing, caching, crawling, serving strategies
-Audit current server and database architecture
-Provide recommendations and strategy for improvement

Currently this job is only for a consultation for 3rd party audit and recommendation. However, if, after discussing a strategy, we feel confident in your abilities then we can discuss the project further and decide how to implement the proposed solutions on an ongoing basis for continuous improvement.
